=== UniMRCP client ===
  * [http://www.freeswitch.org FreeSWITCH] is an open source telephony platform. It provides ASR/TTS interface for the implementation and integration of custom ASR/TTS modules. Module which uses UniMRCP client (mod_unimrcp) to connect FreeSWITCH to MRCP compliant servers is still under the way. Please help with funding finally make this module happen.
